about_the_game:
If there is any abnormality in the robot in your home, please send it back to the company for testing as soon as possible. If it is within the warranty period, the company will provide a set of free testing procedures.

Yankui Company focuses on the research and development and production of low-end daily robots, and is committed to providing intelligent cleaning and services for families and businesses. The leading product is the KL robot, which is widely used in various scenarios such as home cleaning, waiters, and porters due to its high efficiency and flexibility, and has won the trust and support of a large number of users. It has greatly improved the work efficiency and quality of life of old products.

The company continues to innovate, provide users with more intelligent services, and promote the popularization and application of robot technology.

This game will lead players into a future world full of challenges and adventures, where players will play as a highly intelligent robot in testing and participate in a series of carefully designed test levels. Each level is filled with complex obstacles, dangers, and puzzles, requiring players to demonstrate the mobility and intelligence of robots through flexible parkour, jumping, dodging, and climbing.

The game includes various action elements such as parkour, jumping, and dodging. Players need to control robots to quickly react in complex environments, avoid obstacles, complete difficult jumps, and climb accurately. Different terrains and obstacles will test players' operational skills and timing mastery.

In addition to single player challenges, the game also supports cooperative mode, where players can team up with friends to solve interconnected puzzles, attack enemies together, and even use their different robot abilities to cooperate with each other to complete tasks and challenges that require collaboration.

The story revolves around a mysterious testing facility, where players will gradually uncover the secrets hidden behind it. During the process of unlocking each level, players will delve into the truth behind the creation of robots and their complex relationships with humans and AI.

The player's goal is to survive and complete tasks in various testing levels, unravel the secrets behind the facilities, and ultimately discover the true purpose of robot testing.

name: 眼傀公司（EYEPUPPET COMPANY）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 以上
  • Processor: 2GHz 以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 支持DirectX9或以上的显卡
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You will play the role of a robot going to the company for testing, and undergo behavioral tests such as parkour maze decryption and confrontation during the testing.PS：The third level requires four machines to trigger the 1V3 capture special mode.The victories of both sides have different endings.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
